name: The King of Cotton
description: The King of Cotton is a fabric and haberdashery store offering a wide selection of cotton fabrics, lace, sewing threads, and sewing accessories. They specialize in fabrics for clothing, curtains, and upholstery.

name: The Fashion Haberdashery
description: The Fashion Haberdashery is an online store offering a wide range of fabrics, threads, buttons, and sewing accessories. They also provide sewing classes for beginners and experienced sewists.

name: Fabrics and Creations
description: Fabrics and Creations is a fabric store offering a selection of cotton, linen, wool, and polyester fabrics. They also provide sewing classes for all levels.

name: Art Embroidery
description: Art Embroidery is a company specializing in artisanal and industrial embroidery. They offer customization services for clothing, accessories, and decorative items.

name: TechChip
description: TechChip is a supplier of high-quality electronic chips, specializing in solutions for the automotive industry, connected devices, and embedded systems.
